review: There is no up-conversion with this. The quality will not look good on a big TV.YouTube on a 55 inch TV looks very grainy . Not even broadcast quality. Even with 1080p YouTube HD.Have only used it twice since Xmas. Not a buy I would do or recommend again.

review: I cannot say enough about the Google Chromecast. This is the 3rd one we have purchased. We now have one in our Living Room, Bedroom and now our office. We also take one with us when we travel and the size is just perfect for that. The list of apps that now cast are growing making this just an awesome addition to your entertainment set-up. I love being able to use my phone as a remote. Would recommend to anyone in the market for a no-frills HDMI Streaming media Player for a very decent price.
